short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip recipe excess and jump to the good stuff

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
___

Tired of scrolling past anecdotes and stories for your favorite recipes? Tired of looking for the button surrounded by ads that jumps to the recipe, because it blends into the site's style?

This extension jumps right to the recipe on a site for you.
